product_name: Marmot Crystalline Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and minimalist, the women's Marmot Crystalline Rain Jacket offers total weather protection while being small enough to pack in its own pocket. MemBrain(R) Strata(TM) waterproof breathable laminate keeps you completely protected from wind and rain while remaining breathable during aerobic pursuits. 100% taped seams prevent water sneaking in through vulnerable spots. Attached hood is fully adjustable and water resistant; adjustable cuffs allow personalized fit. 2 zippered hand pockets easily store small items. Marmot Crystalline Rain Jacket for women features an elastic drawcord at hem to seal in warmth. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) keeps the jacket in place while allowing full range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and minimalist, the women's Marmot Crystalline Rain Jacket offers total weather protection while being small enough to pack in its own pocket.
